name: Amazing Princess Gymnastics Flips
description:
***One of the hardest and addictive gymnastic games in store !***
Are you ready for the challenge ? Flip your way to gymnastic success in this latest challenging princess gymnastics game!

Just tap when you need to flip. Avoid obstacles and land safely! How many flips can you make before landing ?

Play and have fun together with your friends. Compare your scores and show off your unique gymnast.

You will be hooked in Amazing Gymnastics Flips which also features:
- Very easy one-touch gameplay
- Never ending excitement with endless levels.
- Kids, Girls and boys will surely love the design and the arrangement of the obstacles.
- Amazing sounds and graphics.
- Free to download and play.
